alert.note: Alert for Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 8:15PM CDT until March 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 800 PM CST. * At 714 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Dunbar, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Clayton... Clayton Lake State Park... Stanley... Snow... Nashoba... Dunbar... Eubanks... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
